field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs)⩓not exists(select 1 from dmccdc b where @@table.ma_dc = b.ma_dc) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from dmccdc b where @@table.ma_dc = b.ma_dc) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: loai_dc
field.check: loai_dc not in (select ma_loai from dmplcc)

field.name: ma_ld_tang
field.check: ma_ld_tang not in (select ma_tg_ts from dmtgcc where loai_tg_ts = 1)

field.name: ma_bp_dc
field.check: ma_bp_dc not in (select ma_bp from dmbpcc)⩓exists(select 1 from @@table b where b.ma_dc = @@table.ma_dc and b.ma_bp_dc = @@table.ma_bp_dc group by b.ma_dc, b.ma_bp_dc having count(*) > 1)

field.name: tk_cp
field.check: tk_cp not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: gia_nt
field.check: exists(select 1 from @@table b where @@table.ma_dc = b.ma_dc and @@table.gia_nt <> b.gia_nt)

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: tk_dc
field.check: tk_dc not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: tk_pb
field.check: tk_pb not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_phi
field.check: ma_phi <> '' and ma_phi not in (select ma_phi from dmphi)

field.name: nh_dc1
field.check: nh_dc1 <> '' and nh_dc1 not in (select ma_nh from dmnhcc where loai_nh = 1)

field.name: nh_dc2
field.check: nh_dc2 <> '' and nh_dc2 not in (select ma_nh from dmnhcc where loai_nh = 2)

field.name: nh_dc3
field.check: nh_dc3 <> '' and nh_dc3 not in (select ma_nh from dmnhcc where loai_nh = 3)

processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1) declare @user int, @admin bit, @m int, @r int, @i int, @k int, @count int, @round int, @voucherID varchar(8), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 datetime select @i = 1, @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @round = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_round_tien' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0' select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'dmccdc' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'CC2', @irregularChars = &IrregularValue;, @datetime0 = getdate() select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell &TS2Tran.Nested.Message.v;.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is &TS2Tran.Nested.Message.e;.' end update @@table set so_ct = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct))) + ltrim(so_ct), ma_nt = case when ma_nt <> '' then ma_nt else @baseCurrency end -- Check if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_dc', stt, @message from @@table where ma_dc like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_dc', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_dc like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end -- Checking &Checking; if @admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'TS2Tran', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from dmccdc b where a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc) select a.* into #k from @@table a join dmccdc b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc) if @admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_dvcs', a.stt, '00002' from #k a join dmccdc b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc where &Permissions; &w1;'ma_dvcs'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt), @field = 'ma_dvcs' from #k a join dmccdc b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc where &Permissions; &Error; end end end select @field = 'ma_dc' &TS2Tran.Nested.Key.b; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00003' from @@table a, @@table b where a.ma_dc <> b.ma_dc and a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '%' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00003'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00003' from @@table a, dmccdc b where a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '%' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00003'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, '00003' from dmccdc a, @@table b where a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '%' &w1;@field&w2;b.stt&w3;'00003'&w4; group by b.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b where a.ma_dc <> b.ma_dc and a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, dmccdc b where a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '%'&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from dmccdc a, @@table b where a.ma_dc like rtrim(b.ma_dc) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end end &EndErrorMode; select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_dc, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_bp_dc, b.ma_ld_tang, b.ty_gia, a.tk_cp, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, a.gia, a.nguyen_gia, a.nguyen_gia_nt, a.gt_da_pb, a.gt_da_pb_nt, a.gt_cl, a.gt_cl_nt, a.gt_pb_ky, a.gt_pb_ky_nt, a.dien_giai into #d1 from dmdcct a, dmccdc b select top 0 stt_rec into #stt_rec from #d1 select @count = count(*) from @@table if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dc, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from dmccdc insert into #id1(stt_rec, ma_dc, stt) select '', ma_dc, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_dc select @k = count(*) from #id1 exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @k, @@userID, '#id1' insert into #stt_rec select stt_rec from #id1 insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_dc, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_bp_dc, a.ma_ld_tang, a.ty_gia, a.tk_cp, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, round(a.gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), round(a.nguyen_gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.nguyen_gia_nt, round(a.gt_da_pb_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_da_pb_nt, round(a.gt_cl_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_cl_nt, round(a.gt_pb_ky_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_pb_ky_nt, a.dien_giai from @@table a join #id1 b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc order by a.ma_dc select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i1 from idmdc insert into #i1 select a.stt_rec, b.ngay_ct, b.so_ct, b.ma_dvcs, convert(varchar(12), b.ngay_ct, 112) + b.so_ct + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '#20$' + rtrim(b.loai_dc), '', a.stt from #id1 a join @@table b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_bp_dc, tk_cp', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert @@inserting(master); a join @@table b on a.stt = b.stt join (select ma_dc, sum(nguyen_gia) as t_nguyen_gia, sum(nguyen_gia_nt) as t_nguyen_gia_nt, sum(gt_da_pb) as t_gt_da_pb, sum(gt_da_pb_nt) as t_gt_da_pb_nt, sum(gt_cl) as t_gt_cl, sum(gt_cl_nt) as t_gt_cl_nt, sum(gt_pb_ky) as t_gt_pb_ky, sum(gt_pb_ky_nt) as t_gt_pb_ky_nt from #d1 group by ma_dc) c on a.ma_dc = c.ma_dc @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); end if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dc, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from dmccdc insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_dc, min(stt) from #k a join dmccdc b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc group by a.ma_dc, b.stt_rec insert into #stt_rec select stt_rec from #id2 select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_dc, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_bp_dc, b.ma_ld_tang, b.ty_gia, a.tk_cp, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, a.gia, a.nguyen_gia, a.nguyen_gia_nt, a.gt_da_pb, a.gt_da_pb_nt, a.gt_cl, a.gt_cl_nt, a.gt_pb_ky, a.gt_pb_ky_nt, a.dien_giai into #d2 from dmdcct a, dmccdc b insert into #d2 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_dc, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_bp_dc, a.ma_ld_tang, a.ty_gia, a.tk_cp, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, round(a.gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), round(a.nguyen_gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.nguyen_gia_nt, round(a.gt_da_pb_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_da_pb_nt, round(a.gt_cl_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_cl_nt, round(a.gt_pb_ky_nt * a.ty_gia, @round), a.gt_pb_ky_nt, a.dien_giai from #k a join #id2 b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc order by a.ma_dc select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i2 from idmdc insert into #i2 select b.stt_rec, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_dvcs, convert(varchar(12), a.ngay_ct, 112) + a.so_ct + b.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(b.ma_dc) + '#20$' + rtrim(a.loai_dc), '', b.stt from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i2', '#d2', 'd$', 'ma_bp_dc, tk_cp', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Update update dmccdc set @@list(master); from dmccdc a join #k b on a.ma_dc = b.ma_dc join #id2 d on b.stt = d.stt join ( select ma_dc, sum(nguyen_gia) as t_nguyen_gia, sum(nguyen_gia_nt) as t_nguyen_gia_nt, sum(gt_da_pb) as t_gt_da_pb, sum(gt_da_pb_nt) as t_gt_da_pb_nt, sum(gt_cl) as t_gt_cl, sum(gt_cl_nt) as t_gt_cl_nt, sum(gt_pb_ky) as t_gt_pb_ky, sum(gt_pb_ky_nt) as t_gt_pb_ky_nt from #d2 group by ma_dc ) c on a.ma_dc = c.ma_dc delete dmdcct where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2) truncate table #d1 insert into #d1 select * from #d2 @@inserting(detail); update idmdc set @@list(inquiry); from idmdc a join #i2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end end -- Post exec rs_PostTS2TranImport '#stt_rec'
